title: Firm X's D for labor decreases, no impact on wage

content.question: Which of the following will occur in a perfectly competitive labor market if Firm Xâ€™s demand for labor decreases?

choices.label: Equilibrium Market Wage Rate Equilibrium Market Wage Rate Increase Increase
Equilibrium Market Wage Rate Employment by Firm X No change No change
Equilibrium Market Wage Rate Employment by Firm X No change Decrease
Equilibrium Market Wage Rate Employment by Firm X Decrease Decrease
Equilibrium Market Wage Rate Employment by Firm X Decrease No change

content.answer: Equilibrium Market Wage Rate Employment by Firm X No change Decrease

topic.text: 5.3: Profit-Maximizing Behavior in Perfectly Competitive Factor Markets

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
